sentences.en: After paying a call on the President he returned overjoyed.
sentences.cn: 在一次谒见总统后,他兴高采烈地回来.

sentences.en: Even the little tenderness that at the beginning of her married life would have overjoyed her.
sentences.cn: 在新婚之初,哪怕是些微小的温柔也会使她喜不自胜.

sentences.en: Everybody in the room was overjoyed.
sentences.cn: 一屋子的人都欢腾起来.

sentences.en: Everyone looked overjoyed but no - one spoke: they just turned and looked expectantly at Sun Chi - jen.
sentences.cn: 大家脸上都有喜色,却是谁也不开口,都把询问的眼光射住了 孙吉人.

sentences.en: Fang Hung - chien's in - laws were overjoyed at seeing him.
sentences.cn: 他丈人丈母见他,欢喜得了不得.

sentences.en: He was overjoyed at his son's return.
sentences.cn: 他看到儿子回来欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: He was overjoyed at my success.
sentences.cn: 我的成功使他欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: He was overjoyed when he came upon the answer.
sentences.cn: 当他突然得到答案时欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: I am overjoyed at this new, brilliantly executed achievement.
sentences.cn: 我听到这个新的辉煌成就,高兴万分.

sentences.en: I was overjoyed with ( at ) this good news.
sentences.cn: 我听到这个喜讯非常高兴.

sentences.en: She was overjoyed when the doctor told her that her newborn baby is healthy and normal.
sentences.cn: 当医生告诉她她的新生儿健康正常时,她万分高兴.

sentences.en: She was so overjoyed that she nearly burst out laughing.
sentences.cn: 她心里一乐,几乎笑出声来.

sentences.en: Shelley was overjoyed to see me.
They will be overjoyed to find you safe and well.
sentences.cn: 他们看到你安然无恙,一定喜出望外.

sentences.en: We were overjoyed that they were safe.
sentences.cn: 他们安然无恙,我们万分高兴.

trans.tran_cn: 万分高兴的，欣喜若狂的
使大喜( overjoy的过去式和过去分词 )
